bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description:
Build error on Windows 8.1 using maven: [INFO] --- rpm-maven-plugin:2.1.5:rpm (default) @ deeplearning4j-cli-api --- [WARNING] rpm version string truncated to 0.4 [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------ [INFO] Reactor Summary: [INFO] [INFO] DeepLearning4j ..................................... SUCCESS [ 0.575 s] [INFO] dl4j-test-resources ................................ SUCCESS [ 38.716 s] [INFO] deeplearning4j-core ................................ SUCCESS [ 15.905 s] [INFO] DeepLearning4j-scaleout-parent ..................... SUCCESS [ 0.014 s] [INFO] deeplearning4j-scaleout-api ........................ SUCCESS [ 0.883 s] [INFO] deeplearning4j-scaleout-zookeeper .................. SUCCESS [ 1.259 s] [INFO] deeplearning4j-scaleout-akka ....................... SUCCESS [ 4.270 s] [INFO] deeplearning4j-nlp ................................. SUCCESS [ 14.000 s] [INFO] DeepLearning4j-AWS ................................. SUCCESS [ 1.385 s] [INFO] hadoop-yarn ........................................ SUCCESS [ 0.014 s] [INFO] cdh4 ............................................... SUCCESS [ 3.490 s] [INFO] deeplearning4j-nlp-yarn ............................ SUCCESS [ 3.168 s] [INFO] org.deeplearning4j.spark ........................... SUCCESS [ 4.225 s] [INFO] dl4j-spark ......................................... SUCCESS [ 14.511 s] [INFO] dl4j-spark-nlp ..................................... SUCCESS [ 13.251 s] [INFO] dl4j-spark-ml ...................................... SUCCESS [ 35.718 s] [INFO] deeplearning4j-graph ............................... SUCCESS [ 2.076 s] [INFO] deeplearning4j-cli ................................. SUCCESS [ 0.014 s] [INFO] deeplearning4j-cli-api ............................. FAILURE [ 5.094 s] [INFO] deeplearning4j-ui .................................. SKIPPED [INFO] dl4j-caffe ......................................... SKIPPED [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------ [INFO] BUILD FAILURE [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------ [INFO] Total time: 02:39 min [INFO] Finished at: 2016-03-03T00:26:49+11:00 [INFO] Final Memory: 127M/651M [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------ [ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.codehaus.mojo:rpm-maven-plugin:2.1.5:rpm (default) on project deeplearning4j-cli-api: Unable to query for default vendor from RPM: Error while executing process. Cannot run program "rpm": Cr eateProcess error=2, The system cannot find the file specified -> [Help 1] [ERROR] [ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch. [ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging. [ERROR] [ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles: [ERROR] [Help 1] <denchmark-link:http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/MojoExecutionException>http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/MojoExecutionException</denchmark-link>
[ERROR] [ERROR] After correcting the problems, you can resume the build with the command [ERROR] mvn -rf :deeplearning4j-cli-api

comments.comment: That's because maven rpm plugin relies on underlying rpm package provider. So that will fail on everything but redhat/centos. However, cygwin will probably work too.

My advice would be to define a maven profile that only triggers with certain linux versions. On Wed, Mar 2, 2016 at 8:49 AM, raver119 <denchmark-link:mailto:notifications@github.com>notifications@github.com</denchmark-link> wrote:
That's because maven rpm plugin relies on underlying rpm package provider. So that will fail on everything but redhat/centos. However, cygwin will probably work too. â€” Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/1217#issuecomment-191245053 .
Look like this has been fixed.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jimmyleeeeee>@jimmyleeeeee</denchmark-link> locking this. We don't have the CLI anymore.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
